settings.title: Need help? We’re here to save the day!

settings.question: When  will I receive my order?
settings.answer:
Delivery times vary by pin code. For metro cities, it’s usually 5 working days. Tier 1 and 2 cities typically take 5-7 days, and other areas may take up to 7 days. However, around 93% of orders are delivered in under 5 days across all pin codes.

Please note, there’s an additional 1 business day for order preparation and dispatch.

settings.question: Can I  pay via cash on delivery (COD)?
settings.answer: Yes, you can! COD is available for most pincodes across India. In some cases, it may be unavailable for certain pin codes due to operational issues, but our customer support team will be happy to assist you with a solution.

settings.question: Can I  cancel my order?
settings.answer:
Once an order is placed, we process it quickly to ensure fast delivery. However, if you wish to cancel, please contact us as soon as possible. We’ll check the status of your order and see if it can be canceled. Please note, once an order has been dispatched, cancellations or changes are no longer possible.

For prepaid orders, refunds will be processed within 7 working days from the cancellation date.

settings.question: I’ve  changed my mind. Is it possible to change my order?
settings.answer: We process orders quickly to ensure fast shipping, so once an order is placed, it’s sent straight to our warehouse for packing and dispatch. If you’d like to make a change, please contact us immediately, and we’ll check the status of your order. Keep in mind, changes might not be possible once the order is dispatched from our warehouse.
